    Amar Chandole!

    Apr 9, 2015

    I am currently a final year BE student in Information Technology, Pune Institute Of Computer Technology. I like to tackle logical puzzles and learn new algorithms. I also like to explore new streams in Computer Technology in my free time apart from basic programming. I have a research oriented outlook.

    My objective is to pursue a highly rewarding career, seeking knowledge and experience of working on various cutting edge technologies in a challenging and healthy environment.

    My areas of interest are File Systems, Databases, Operating Systems, Computer Networking, Algorithms and System Programming.

    My non-academic interests include photography, singing, sound mixing, participating in elocution and debate competitions, coding competitions, etc. I have strong inter-personal skills and leadership skills. I am also active in inter-college theater competitions and other cultural activities. Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

    Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll’s dedicated Help repository.
